title: It is showing I have more IP than I really do.
body: I really have 827 IP, but it is showing 1302. Any fixes? I have tried restarting league, and that doesn't seem to work. I filled out 2 bug reports, one a week ago, one today, but nothing has changed.

replies.body:
There have been some IP balance issues as of late. Try launching into the Legacy Client from the login screen then visit the store and see if your IP Balance updates.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/215576628/Launch-Legacy-Client.jpg

Let me know if this worked for you.
It did! Twitter RiotSupport helped me first though. Thanks for the help.
